title: Track Awesome Slim Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Slim (nekofar/awesome-slim) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome Slim framework packages and resources.

items.title: Awesome Slim Updates on Aug 29 - Sep 04, 2022
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Aug 29 - Sep 04, 2022
items.content_text:
### Boilerplate

*   [Slim 4 Starter (⭐70)](https://github.com/nbayramberdiyev/slim-4-starter) - An opinionated Slim 4 starter template for the small-to-medium PHP applications.

### Miscellaneous

*   [Slim Validation (⭐170)](https://github.com/DavidePastore/Slim-Validation) - A validation library for the Slim Framework.
items.content_html:
Boilerplate

  • Slim 4 Starter (⭐70) - An opinionated Slim 4 starter template for the small-to-medium PHP applications.

Miscellaneous

  • Slim Validation (⭐170) - A validation library for the Slim Framework.

items.title: Awesome Slim Updates on Jan 17 - Jan 23, 2022

items.title: Awesome Slim Updates on Dec 20 - Dec 26, 2021
items.summary: 3 awesome projects updated on Dec 20 - Dec 26, 2021
items.content_text:
### Educational

*   [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/slim) - Slim Framework questions over Stack Overflow.
*   [Slim 4 - GraphQL](https://odan.github.io/2021/08/12/slim-graphql.html) - Creating a modern HTTP APIs usig GraphQL.
*   [Slim 4 - ReactPHP](https://odan.github.io/2021/08/14/slim-reactphp.html) - Slim in combination with ReactPHP for the performance boost.
items.content_html:
Educational

  • Stack Overflow - Slim Framework questions over Stack Overflow.
  • Slim 4 - GraphQL - Creating a modern HTTP APIs usig GraphQL.
  • Slim 4 - ReactPHP - Slim in combination with ReactPHP for the performance boost.

items.title: Awesome Slim Updates on Sep 13 - Sep 19, 2021
items.summary: 21 awesome projects updated on Sep 13 - Sep 19, 2021
items.content_text:
### Boilerplate

*   [Slim 4 MVC Skeleton (⭐81)](https://github.com/semhoun/slim-skeleton-mvc) - This is a simple web application skeleton project.
*   [Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐50)](https://github.com/adriansuter/Slim4-Skeleton) - Web application skeleton that uses the PHP-DI, Nyholm PSR7 and Twig.
*   [Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐452)](https://github.com/odan/slim4-skeleton) - This is a skeleton to quickly set up a new Slim 4 application.
*   [Slim Skeleton (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Skeleton) - The official Slim Framework 4 Skeleton Application.

### Middlewares

*   [Slim Basic Auth (⭐445)](https://github.com/tuupola/slim-basic-auth) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 HTTP Basic Authentication Middleware.
*   [Slim CSRF (⭐348)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Csrf) - Slim Framework CSRF protection middleware.
*   [Slim HTTP Cache (⭐116)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-HttpCache) - Slim Framework HTTP cache middleware and service provider.
*   [Slim JWT Auth (⭐828)](https://github.com/tuupola/slim-jwt-auth) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 JWT Authentication Middleware.
*   [Slim Minify (⭐37)](https://github.com/christianklisch/slim-minify) - Slim middleware to minify HTML output generated by the slim.
*   [Slim Session (⭐233)](https://github.com/bryanjhv/slim-session) - A very simple session middleware for Slim Framework.
*   [Slim Whoops (⭐132)](https://github.com/zeuxisoo/php-slim-whoops) - PHP whoops error on slim framework.

### Templating

*   [Slim Twig View (⭐367)](https://github.com/slimphp/Twig-View) - Slim Framework view helper built on top of the Twig templating component.
*   [Slim Plates (⭐26)](https://github.com/projek-xyz/slim-plates) - Render your Slim application views using Plates template engine.
*   [Slim PHP View (⭐269)](https://github.com/slimphp/PHP-View) - This is a renderer for rendering PHP view scripts into a PSR-7 Response object.

### Development

*   [Pest Slim Plugin (⭐5)](https://github.com/nekofar/pest-plugin-slim) - The Slim Plugin for Pest gives your basic functionality for testing.
*   [Slim Test (⭐5)](https://github.com/nekofar/slim-test) - Slim Framework test helper built on top of the PHPUnit test framework.

### Miscellaneous

*   [BasePath (⭐49)](https://github.com/selective-php/basepath) - Base path detector for Slim 4.
*   [PHP-DI Slim Bridge (⭐175)](https://github.com/PHP-DI/Slim-Bridge) - PHP-DI integration with the Slim framework.
*   [Slim Config (⭐33)](https://github.com/DavidePastore/Slim-Config) - A file configuration loader that supports PHP, INI, XML, JSON, and YML files.
*   [Slim Console (⭐28)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Console) - Slim Framework Console.
*   [Slim Flash (⭐152)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Flash) - Slim Framework flash messages service provider.
items.content_html:
Boilerplate

  • Slim 4 MVC Skeleton (⭐81) - This is a simple web application skeleton project.
  • Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐50) - Web application skeleton that uses the PHP-DI, Nyholm PSR7 and Twig.
  • Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐452) - This is a skeleton to quickly set up a new Slim 4 application.
  • Slim Skeleton (⭐1.6k) - The official Slim Framework 4 Skeleton Application.

Middlewares

  • Slim Basic Auth (⭐445) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 HTTP Basic Authentication Middleware.
  • Slim CSRF (⭐348) - Slim Framework CSRF protection middleware.
  • Slim HTTP Cache (⭐116) - Slim Framework HTTP cache middleware and service provider.
  • Slim JWT Auth (⭐828) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 JWT Authentication Middleware.
  • Slim Minify (⭐37) - Slim middleware to minify HTML output generated by the slim.
  • Slim Session (⭐233) - A very simple session middleware for Slim Framework.
  • Slim Whoops (⭐132) - PHP whoops error on slim framework.

Templating

  • Slim Twig View (⭐367) - Slim Framework view helper built on top of the Twig templating component.
  • Slim Plates (⭐26) - Render your Slim application views using Plates template engine.
  • Slim PHP View (⭐269) - This is a renderer for rendering PHP view scripts into a PSR-7 Response object.

Development

  • Pest Slim Plugin (⭐5) - The Slim Plugin for Pest gives your basic functionality for testing.
  • Slim Test (⭐5) - Slim Framework test helper built on top of the PHPUnit test framework.

Miscellaneous

  • BasePath (⭐49) - Base path detector for Slim 4.
  • PHP-DI Slim Bridge (⭐175) - PHP-DI integration with the Slim framework.
  • Slim Config (⭐33) - A file configuration loader that supports PHP, INI, XML, JSON, and YML files.
  • Slim Console (⭐28) - Slim Framework Console.
  • Slim Flash (⭐152) - Slim Framework flash messages service provider.
